title: Subway Girl:  A story of love and redemption
description: Millions of people cross paths on the New York subway everyday, but rarely do two souls intersect in a way that changes them both forever. Ray Kelly wasn't looking for love. He wasn't looking for anything. He was merely existing when he encounters a beautiful young woman who inspires him to live again. As he navigates his way towards a better life, he discovers a resiliency within himself and an ability to experience a depth of love he could not have imagined.
author: Donna Beck
